mapper.update: MERGE INTO user_env (userid, TYPE, ${vcol}) KEY ("USERID", "TYPE", ${vcol}) VALUES (#{userid}, #{type}, #{value})

MERGE INTO user_env e USING ( VALUES (#{userid}, #{type}, #{value}) ) AS s("USERID", "TYPE", ${vcol}) ON e.userid = s.userid AND e.type = s.type AND e.${vcol} = s.${vcol} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ("USERID", "TYPE", ${vcol}) VALUES (s.userid, s.type, s.${vcol}) ELSE IGNORE
